dependencies.description:
Supports both client and server side of HTTP protocol. Supports both
client and server Web-Sockets out-of-the-box and avoids Callbacks.
Provides Web-server with middlewares and plugable routing.
dependencies.name: py-aiohttp

dependencies.description: Hatch plugin for versioning with your preferred VCS
dependencies.name: py-hatch-vcs

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
Python ARM Radar Toolkit. A growing collection of weather radar
algorithms and utilities build on top of the Scientific Python stack and
distributed under the 3-Clause BSD license. Py-ART is used by the
Atmospheric Radiation Measurement (ARM) Climate Research Facility for
working with data from a number of precipitation and cloud radars, but
has been designed so that it can be used by others in the radar and
atmospheric communities to examine, processes, and analyse data from
many types of weather radars.
dependent_to.name: py-arm-pyart

dependent_to.description:
The Astropy Project is a community effort to develop a single core
package for Astronomy in Python and foster interoperability between
Python astronomy packages.
dependent_to.name: py-astropy

dependent_to.description: Manipulate JSON-like data with NumPy-like idioms.
dependent_to.name: py-awkward

dependent_to.description:
Built based on the Apache Arrow columnar memory format, cuDF is a GPU
DataFrame library for loading, joining, aggregating, filtering, and
otherwise manipulating data.
dependent_to.name: py-cudf

dependent_to.description: Dask is a flexible parallel computing library for analytics.
dependent_to.name: py-dask

dependent_to.description:
Datasets is a lightweight library providing two main features: one-line
dataloaders for many public datasets and efficient data pre-processing.
dependent_to.name: py-datasets

dependent_to.description: Dinosaur: differentiable dynamics for global atmospheric modeling.
dependent_to.name: py-dinosaur

dependent_to.description: Git for data scientists - manage your code and data together.
dependent_to.name: py-dvc

dependent_to.description:
Earth-2 Model Intercomparison Project (MIP). A python framework that
enables climate researchers and scientists to explore and experiment
with AI models for weather and climate.
dependent_to.name: py-earth2mip

dependent_to.description:
Embedding reader is a module to make it easy to read efficiently a large
collection of embeddings stored in any file system.
dependent_to.name: py-embedding-reader

dependent_to.description: etils (eclectic utils) is an open-source collection of utils for python.
dependent_to.name: py-etils

dependent_to.description: An XRootD implementation for fsspec.
dependent_to.name: py-fsspec-xrootd

dependent_to.description: Pythonic file-system for Google Cloud Storage.
dependent_to.name: py-gcsfs

dependent_to.description:
Python library for easily interacting with trained machine learning
models
dependent_to.name: py-gradio-client

dependent_to.description:
Horovod is a distributed deep learning training framework for
TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, and Apache MXNet.
dependent_to.name: py-horovod

dependent_to.description:
Client library to download and publish models, datasets and other repos
on the huggingface.co hub.
dependent_to.name: py-huggingface-hub

dependent_to.description: The deep learning framework to pretrain, finetune and deploy AI models.
dependent_to.name: py-lightning

dependent_to.description:
Fabric is the fast and lightweight way to scale PyTorch models without
boilerplate.
dependent_to.name: py-lightning-fabric

dependent_to.description:
LightningLite enables pure PyTorch users to scale their existing code on
any kind of device while retaining full control over their own loops and
optimization logic.
dependent_to.name: py-lightning-lite

dependent_to.description: Modin: Make your pandas code run faster by changing one line of code.
dependent_to.name: py-modin

dependent_to.description: A deep learning framework for AI-driven multi-physics systems.
dependent_to.name: py-nvidia-modulus

dependent_to.description:
Petastorm is a library enabling the use of Parquet storage from
Tensorflow, Pytorch, and other Python-based ML training frameworks.
dependent_to.name: py-petastorm

dependent_to.description: PyTorch Lightning is the lightweight PyTorch wrapper for ML researchers.
dependent_to.name: py-pytorch-lightning

dependent_to.description:
S3FS builds on aiobotocore to provide a convenient Python filesystem
interface for S3.
dependent_to.name: py-s3fs

dependent_to.description: Pandas extension arrays for spatial/geometric operations.
dependent_to.name: py-spatialpandas

dependent_to.description:
Tensors and Dynamic neural networks in Python with strong GPU
acceleration.
dependent_to.name: py-torch

dependent_to.description: Graph Neural Network Library for PyTorch.
dependent_to.name: py-torch-geometric

dependent_to.description: N-D labeled arrays and datasets in Python
dependent_to.name: py-xarray

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
